content.rendered:
Directed by Manav Sohal

Written by Manav Sohal

Cast Manav Sohal (Mr. PK). Brijendra Kala (Mr. Lele). Vaishnavi Dhanraj (Merry Marlo) . Shravani Goswami (Monika Marlo). Sumona Gupta

Language Hindi

Producers Sailesh Gosrani. Manav Sohal. Amarjeet s Singh. Imran S Saifee. Nayan Kumar. Toofan Patel

Production Mumbai Talkies Company. Vriksh Studio
